name: One Room into Three
description:
One Room into Three - This game was made for the Ben Bonk #2 Game Jam, the theme was Limited space. In this game, you play as a Black Square with eyes, you navigate through Eight Different rooms, each of them being divided into rooms with Limited Space by invisible barriers, and complete tasks to unlock new segments of the room.  

IMPORTANT: All of the levels can be completed.

Hope you enjoy - Nerdy Coder 

:)
